title: Microdata
body: Microdata is used to nest semantics within existing content on web pages.

comments.body: I think there should be at least a detection for schema.org artifacts... it should allow for any third party plugin to easily do stuff with those artifacts.
Note that Microdata support was removed from both Chrome and Safari/WebKit: http://manu.sporny.org/2013/microdata-downward-spiral/
Microdata is nice, but I don't get what there would be to support - it's just there.
